Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

huePhoneDialer Gives the Opportunity to Get Custom Colors and Options for the Phone Dialer!

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

See larger Screenshots below..

Version 1.0.4 - Added support for arm64e/A12. Version 1.0.3
- Compatible with iOS 12 (Checked and just Working Fine).
Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Make Smooth the Dialer Keypad Background.


Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Hide the Add Number Label.
- Added the option to Hide the Contact Name Label.
